exercise.prompt: What is the capital of Zxyzzy?

exercises.response: The capital of Zxyzzy is **Kwazaaqat** (pronounced "Khawz-ay-tah"). Kwazaaqat is an ancient kingdom located between the Great Plains of North America and Lake Superior in present-day Minnesota. It was once one of the major civilizations of the Ancestral Puebloans and later became part of the Dakota territory under French colonization.
